mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_new FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, product_id, product_name, product_price, product_new FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_new FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_new = 1 ORDER BY product_datetime DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET product_new = 1 WHERE product_id IN ( SELECT product_id FROM ( SELECT product_id FROM ( SELECT product_id FROM product ORDER BY product_datetime DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 8 ) )

UPDATE PRODUCT SET product_best = 1 WHERE product_id IN ( SELECT product_id FROM ( SELECT p.product_id FROM order_product op LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON p.product_id = op.product_id ORDER BY op.order_product_count DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 8 )
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_usecase, image_original_name, image_type, image_data FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND product_usecase = #{productUsecase}

SELECT product_id, product_price, product_name, product_best, order_product_count FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, product_id, product_price, product_name, product_best, order_product_count FROM ( SELECT p.product_id, p.product_price, p.product_name, p.product_best, op.order_product_count FROM ORDER_PRODUCT op LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_id = op.product_id ORDER BY op.order_product_count DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_recom FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, product_id, product_name, product_price, product_recom FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_recom FROM product WHERE product_recom = 1 ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, product_id, product_name, product_price, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best FROM PRODUCT WHERE category_name = #{categoryName} ORDER BY product_id ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE category_name = #{categoryName}
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, category_name FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( product_id, product_name, category_name, product_price, product_datetime, product_detail, product_state, product_stock, product_recom, product_new, product_best ) VALUES ( seq_product_id.nextval, #{productName}, #{categoryName}, #{productPrice}, sysdate, #{productDetail}, #{productState}, #{productStock}, #{productRecom}, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT product_id FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_name = #{productName} ORDER BY product_id DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_datetime, product_detail, product_state, product_stock, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, product_id, product_name, product_price, product_datetime, product_detail, product_state, product_stock, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best FROM (SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_datetime, product_detail, product_state, product_stock, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY product_id DESC) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM PRODUCT WHERE category_name = #{categoryName} AND product_id NOT IN #{productId} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_count FROM ( SELECT p.product_id AS product_id, p.product_name AS product_name, p.product_price AS product_price, COUNT(p.product_id) AS product_count FROM ORDER_PRODUCT op LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT p ON op.product_id = p.product_id WHERE order_number IN ( SELECT order_number FROM ORDER_PRODUCT WHERE product_id = #{product_id} ) GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price ORDER BY COUNT(p.product_id) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND product_id NOT IN #{productId}
SELECT category_name FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET product_name = #{productName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_detail = #{productDetail}, product_state = #{productState}, product_stock = #{productStock}, product_recom = #{productRecom}, category_name = #{categoryName} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_datetime, product_detail, product_state, product_stock, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_datetime, product_detail, product_state, product_stock, product_recom, category_name, product_new, product_best, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY product_id DESC) AS rnum FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNo} AND #{endRowNo}
